realtime

realtime is an R package for creating data visualizations.

Create a live plot.

realtime(x, title = "Real time data", ylim = NULL, padding = 0,
  width = NULL, height = NULL, elementId = NULL)

Arguments

x

function for fetching and process data.
title

character title for the plot.
ylim

numeric range for y-axis.
padding

numeric the padding of the plot.
width

numeric the width of the plot.
height

numeric the height of the plot.
elementId

character HTML element identifier.

Details

The argument to x should be a function that returns a numeric vector containing a X and Y coordinates for plotting in real-time.

Examples


realtime(function() rnorm(1, mean = 5), "Random numbers")
#> Warning: file("") only supports open = "w+" and open = "w+b": using the former
#> Error in dirname(to): a character vector argument expected
